control_attributes.control_description: The information system generates audit records containing information that establishes what type of event occurred, when the event occurred, where the event occurred, the source of the event, the outcome of the event, and the identity of any individuals or subjects associated with the event.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system provides centralized management and configuration of the content to be captured in audit records generated by [Assignment: organization-defined information system components].

Control Statement: The information system generates audit records containing information that establishes what type of event occurred, when the event occurred, where the event occurred, the source of the event, the outcome of the event, and the identity of any individuals or subjects associated with the event.
